title:
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology      ii 
 
 
 
NATIONAL STRATEGY  
ON
summary: This document outlines a national strategy for blockchain technology adoption by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (Government of India) to enhance digital governance. The strategy focuses on building trust in digital platforms through technological advancements, addressing challenges, and fostering collaboration across various sectors.

summary: The document discusses leveraging AI in small businesses while considering resource limitations. It emphasizes promoting a data-driven culture and clarifying business goals before implementing AI to ensure sustainability and scalability.
content_preview:
When you run a small
business, you
understand how
limitations can prevent
you from reaching your
full potential.
  Limited resources
mean you must choose
where to invest time,
money, and energy.
Will analytics be one
of those investments? Given the fact that
your business has
limited resources, you
need to promote a
data-driven culture
without hurting your
sustainability. Before going ahead with AI, you need
to clarify your goals as a company.
This will allow you to have a clear view
